#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	ll  t,k,c=0,n,i,b1;
	vector<ll>v;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		c=0;
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>b1;
			v.push_back(b1);
		}
		k=v[0];
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(v[i]>k)
			{
				c++;
				k=v[i];
			}
		}
		cout<<c<<'\n';
		v.clear();
	}
	
	return 0;
}
